title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 20, 2013
description: Markets across Asia are down, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it. Why is it so complicated to buy World Cup soccer tickets? And small businesses fight back against cruise ship kickbacks.
byline: Mitchell Hartman, Ann Heppermann, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Alfredo Gutierrez, Karishma Vaswani, Bruce Johnson, Mark Garrison and Queena Kim
teaser: Markets across Asia are down, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it. Why is it so complicated to buy World Cup soccer tickets? And small businesses fight back against cruise ship kickbacks.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 20, 2013
